functions.name: kubelet_authorization_mode
functions.description: Checks kubelet authorization mode.

functions.name: kubelet_client_ca_file_set
functions.description: Checks if client CA file is set for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_conf_file_ownership
functions.description: Checks ownership of kubelet config file.

functions.name: kubelet_conf_file_permissions
functions.description: Checks permissions of kubelet config file.

functions.name: kubelet_config_yaml_ownership
functions.description: Checks ownership of kubelet config YAML.

functions.name: kubelet_config_yaml_permissions
functions.description: Checks permissions of kubelet config YAML.

functions.name: kubelet_disable_anonymous_auth
functions.description: Checks if anonymous auth is disabled for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_disable_read_only_port
functions.description: Checks if read-only port is disabled for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_event_record_qps
functions.description: Checks event record QPS for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_manage_iptables
functions.description: Checks if kubelet manages iptables.

functions.name: kubelet_rotate_certificates
functions.description: Checks if kubelet rotates certificates.

functions.name: kubelet_service_file_ownership_root
functions.description: Checks ownership of kubelet service file (root).

functions.name: kubelet_service_file_permissions
functions.description: Checks permissions of kubelet service file.

functions.name: kubelet_streaming_connection_timeout
functions.description: Checks streaming connection timeout for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_tls_cert_and_key
functions.description: Checks TLS cert and key for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_strong_ciphers_only
functions.description: Checks if only strong ciphers are used for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_ca_file_permissions_check
functions.description: Checks CA file permissions for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_no_hostname_override
functions.description: Checks if hostname override is not set for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_set_pod_pid_limit
functions.description: Checks if pod PID limit is set for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_client_certificate_and_key_check
functions.description: Checks client certificate and key for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_certificate_authority_check
functions.description: Checks certificate authority for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_seccomp_default_check
functions.description: Checks seccomp default for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_ip_address_deny_check
functions.description: Checks IP address deny for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_https_argument_check
functions.description: Checks HTTPS argument for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_insecure_experimental_approve_all_csrs_check
functions.description: Checks insecure experimental approve-all-CSRs for kubelet.

functions.name: kubelet_protect_kernel_defaults_check
functions.description: Checks protection of kernel defaults for kubelet.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes KUBELET API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
KUBELET is a Kubernetes node management component.
Configuration, security, monitoring, node, and compliance are key aspects.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
